subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
Dogs
lead_paragraph: A Russian billionaire has donated money for a shelter in a bid to save some of the hundreds of stray dogs that are being killed in preparation for the Sochi Olympic Games.
snippet: A Russian billionaire has donated money for a shelter in a bid to save some of the hundreds of stray dogs that are being killed in preparation for the Sochi Olympic Games.
